name: smgrpismgmOLD

stmt.origin: eleq2s(c0, csem, cin(cmagm, cass), wcel(c0, cmagm))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, csem), wcel(c0, cmagm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cass)), wcel(c0, cmagm))
-| wceq(csem, cin(cmagm, cass))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ SemiGrp → c0 ∈ Magma)
⊣ (c0 ∈(Magma ⋂ Ass)→ c0 ∈ Magma)
⊣ SemiGrp =(Magma ⋂ Ass)

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ SemiGrp → c0 ∈ Magma)
⊣ (c0 ∈(Magma ⋂ Ass)→ c0 ∈ Magma)
⊣ SemiGrp =(Magma ⋂ Ass)

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cass)), wcel(c0, cmagm), wcel(c0, cass))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈(Magma ⋂ Ass), c0 ∈ Magma, c0 ∈ Ass)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cass)), wcel(c0, cmagm))

⊣ (c0 ∈(Magma ⋂ Ass)↔(c0 ∈ Magma ∧ c0 ∈ Ass))

⊣ (c0 ∈(Magma ⋂ Ass)↔(c0 ∈ Magma ∧ c0 ∈ Ass))

comment: Obsolete version of ~ sgrpmgm as of 3-Feb-2020. A semigroup is a magma. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
